src:
山形新幹線、イノシシに衝突…乗客１人軽傷

02 Nov 2019, 14:47

　２日午後９時４９分頃、山形新幹線の東京発新庄行き「つばさ１５７号」が奥羽線（山形線）の羽前中山―かみのやま温泉駅（いずれも山形県上山市）間でイノシシに衝突した。この事故で、乗客の６０歳代男性が軽傷を負った。
　ＪＲ東日本によると、つばさ１５７号は衝突現場に停車していたが、車両点検の結果、異常が見られなかったため、午後１０時２５分に運転を再開した。事故により、上下線各１本が遅れ、約４３５人の乗客の足に影響が出た。
text:
Yamagata Shinkansen collides with wild boar.

02 Nov 2019, 14:47

Around 9:49 pm on the 2nd, “Tsubasa 157” from Tokyo to Shinjo on the Yamagata Shinkansen collided with a wild boar between Uzen Nakayama and Kaminoyama Onsen Station (both Kamiyama City, Yamagata Prefecture) on the Ou Line (Yamagata Line) did. In this accident, a man in his 60s was slightly injured.
According to JR East, Tsubasa 157 was stopped at the collision site, but as a result of vehicle inspection, there was no abnormality, so it resumed operation at 10:25 pm. The accident caused a delay in each of the upper and lower lines, affecting the legs of about 435 passengers.
